alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 11 at 6:42PM CST until November 11 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... North central Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Southwestern Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 745 PM CST. * At 642 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glenmora, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Glenmora, Cheneyville, Lecompte, Echo, Poland, Ruby, Calcasieu, Woodworth, Forest Hill, Mcnary and Union Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 51 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
